name: V02-GOBW
description:
Brand: VOID Watches Designer: David Ericsson Product Code: V02-GO/BW Analogue Display with Quartz Japan Movement Measurement: W36 x H42 x D9 mm (casing) Casing material: 316 Stainless Steel Casing colour / finishing: Brushed IP Gold Strap: Premium Brown Textured Leather (24mm) Buckle: Stainless Steel with Brushed IP Gold Functions: Time/Date/Light Water Resistance: 3ATM/30M Battery Type: SR626W/1.55V Silver Oxide Cell This iconic watch features a novel interpretation of the classic speedometer-style dial showing only half of the traditional circular face. The V02 uses two double-ended ‘compass needle’ hands, indicating the time as on a normal watch. Each hand has one red and one white tip at opposite ends where each coloured tip corresponds to the digit with the matching colour on the dial. For further instruction on how to read, please go to here. The V02 uses a premium leather strap and comes in a range of colours and finishing, with matching buckle on the casing. All our watches are packaged in a white gift box of dimension 258 x 58 x 23 mm. All prices are in HKD. Prices are subject to change.

name: Handmade Washi Tape Organizer
description:
Individually handcrafted by whixion+art | CONCEPT. This is a 2-in-1 Washi Tape Dispenser & Holder. All of the washi tape will fit on the 30mm wooden rod nicely. These are made out of solid wood using traditional woodworking skills. To minimize carbon footprint, we only use hand tools for most of the wood products. Every dispenser is unique and are not all identically shaped or colored. (washi tapes not included) - Made from untreated KD Acacia mangium. - The dispenser can hold up to 11 rolls of 15mm wide washi tape for easy cutting. - The holder can stack up to 13 rolls. L 32.5 x D 9.5 x H 22.5 cm  L 12-3/4 x D 3-3/4 x H 8-3/4 in All prices are in PHP. Prices are subject to change. Washi tape not included. Note: This is a made to order item. Most orders ship within 2-4 weeks unless listed as otherwise. Some items have longer production time based on how they are manufactured, availability of reclaimed wood or the number of orders. Each piece might show natural wood imperfections, slight variations in color, grain & dimensions, all adding to the uniqueness of every item.
